transArray.content: The front desk service was very good and the breakfast was delicious.

Hello dear guest! Thank you for your recognition of the service attitude of our friends at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Your encouragement is very important. If life is a journey, we are willing to be your warmest stop. If meeting is a ballad, we are willing to be your wisp. A happy note. I want you to write down your mood in notes. Thank you very much for your recognition of the breakfast in the hotel. Only by living well and eating well can you feel at home. I believe that with your support, we will continue to improve the quality of all aspects of the hotel to ensure that you will be happy every time you stay. All hotel staff sincerely look forward to your stay again! wish you a happy life! General Manager: Zhang Xiangyun
